20110108050553.000|20110108050556.000|CC1|>> WE GREW UP IN THIS CITY WHICH
20110108050556.000|20110108050558.000|CC1|IS RIGHT ON THE MOUTH OF THE    
20110108050558.000|20110108050558.000|CC1|AMAZON.

20110108052115.000|20110108052117.000|CC1|>>> ON THE NIGHT OF OCTOBER     
20110108052117.000|20110108052120.000|CC1|15th, 1979 TWO DRIFTERS RACED   
20110108052120.000|20110108052123.000|CC1|WAY FROM THE OKARCHE, OKLAHOMA, 
20110108052123.000|20110108052125.000|CC1|HOME OF THE DOUGLASS FAMILY.    
20110108052125.000|20110108052126.000|CC1|IN THEIR WAKE WERE THE DEAD AND 
20110108052126.000|20110108052127.000|CC1|DYING.                          
20110108052127.000|20110108052128.000|CC1|PASTOR RICHARD DOUGLASS AND HIS 
20110108052128.000|20110108052130.000|CC1|WIFE MARILYN SHOT TO DEATH.     
20110108052130.000|20110108052131.000|CC1|16-YEAR-OLD BROOKS AND HIS      
20110108052131.000|20110108052134.000|CC1|12-YEAR-OLD SISTER LESLIE, EACH 
20110108052134.000|20110108052136.000|CC1|SHOT TWICE WERE HOGTIED AND     
20110108052136.000|20110108052138.000|CC1|BLEEDING BESIDE THE BODIES OF   
20110108052138.000|20110108052140.000|CC1|THEIR PARENPARENTS.             
20110108052140.000|20110108052142.000|CC1|>> IF I WAS GOING TO LIVE, I    
20110108052142.000|20110108052143.000|CC1|NEEDED TO MAKE A DECISION.      
20110108052143.000|20110108052144.000|CC1|I REMEMBER THINKING AS LONG AS I
20110108052144.000|20110108052146.000|CC1|CAN DRAW BREATH OR EVEN TWITCH A
20110108052146.000|20110108052148.000|CC1|MUSCLE, I NEED TO KEEP TRYING.  
20110108052148.000|20110108052149.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE HOUSE WAS      
20110108052149.000|20110108052150.000|CC1|EERILY QUIET.                   
20110108052150.000|20110108052152.000|CC1|AND BROOKS FEARED HIS SISTER,   
20110108052152.000|20110108052153.000|CC1|TOO, WAS GONE.                  
20110108052153.000|20110108052157.000|CC1|>> I HAD BEEN SHOUTING TO HER   
20110108052157.000|20110108052158.000|CC1|PERIODICALLY AND SHE WAS        
20110108052158.000|20110108052159.000|CC1|RESPONDING.                     
20110108052159.000|20110108052200.000|CC1|THEN SHE STOPPED RESPONDING.    
20110108052200.000|20110108052201.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YET, DESPITE BEING 
20110108052201.000|20110108052203.000|CC1|SHOT TWICE HERSELF, LESLIE WILL 
20110108052203.000|20110108052206.000|CC1|SOMEHOW ESCAPED HER BONDS AND   
20110108052206.000|20110108052207.000|CC1|MADE HER WAY TO THE KITCHEN.    
20110108052207.000|20110108052209.000|CC1|>> I LOOKED UP AND LESLIE CAME  
20110108052209.000|20110108052211.000|CC1|RUNNING IN WITH A KNIFE AND CUT 
20110108052211.000|20110108052211.000|CC1|ME LOOSE.                       
20110108052211.000|20110108052213.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU'RE THE ONE WHO 
20110108052213.000|20110108052214.000|CC1|GOT THINGS GOING AFTERWARDS?

20110108053021.000|20110108053023.000|CC1|      fast-acting inhalers      
20110108053023.000|20110108053025.000|CC1|       for sudden symptoms

20110108053025.000|20110108053027.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110108053027.000|20110108053027.000|CC1|        People with COPD

20110108053349.000|20110108053350.000|CC1|INTERESTING ABOUT THEM?         
20110108053350.000|20110108053353.000|CC1|>> HOW ANALYTICAL ABOUT IT THEY 
20110108053353.000|20110108053354.000|CC1|WERE.                           
20110108053354.000|20110108053355.000|CC1|AND ASKED QUESTIONS AND WHAT WAS
20110108053355.000|20110108053356.000|CC1|GOING TO HAPPEN.                
20110108053356.000|20110108053358.000|CC1|THAT THEY WERE PRETTY           
20110108053358.000|20110108053358.000|CC1|INTELLIGENT KIDS.               
20110108053358.000|20110108053400.000|CC1|THEY WERE PRETTY WELL IN CONTROL
20110108053400.000|20110108053401.000|CC1|OF THEIR EMOTIONS.              
20110108053401.000|20110108053403.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AS YOU WERE LYING  
20110108053403.000|20110108053404.000|CC1|IN THE HOSPITAL TRYING TO       
20110108053404.000|20110108053405.000|CC1|RECOVER, TRYING TO UNDERSTAND   
20110108053405.000|20110108053406.000|CC1|WHAT HAD HAPPENED TO YOU, WHAT  
20110108053406.000|20110108053407.000|CC1|WAS THAT LIKE FOR YOU?          
20110108053407.000|20110108053410.000|CC1|>> IT WAS REALLY STRANGE.       
20110108053410.000|20110108053412.000|CC1|PART OF IT WAS I THINK NOBODY   
20110108053412.000|20110108053414.000|CC1|KNEW HOW TO REACT.              
20110108053414.000|20110108053415.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF THE CHURCH WOULD COME
20110108053415.000|20110108053417.000|CC1|IN AND TO CONSOLE US AND WE     
20110108053417.000|20110108053420.000|CC1|WOULD WIND UP CONSOLING THEM AND
20110108053420.000|20110108053421.000|CC1|HUGGING THEM.                   
20110108053421.000|20110108053422.000|CC1|HEY, IT'S GOING TO BE OKAY.     
20110108053422.000|20110108053423.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO BE OKAY.         
20110108053423.000|20110108053424.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THREE WEEKS AFTER  
20110108053424.000|20110108053425.000|CC1|THE SHOOTING BROOKS AND LESLIE  
20110108053425.000|20110108053426.000|CC1|WERE SPIRITED OUT OF THE        
20110108053426.000|20110108053429.000|CC1|HOSPITAL AND TAKEN TO A SECURE  
20110108053429.000|20110108053431.000|CC1|LOCATION STILL UNDER POLICE     
20110108053431.000|20110108053431.000|CC1|GUARD.                          
20110108053431.000|20110108053432.000|CC1|IT WAS HALLOWEEN.               
20110108053432.000|20110108053435.000|CC1|>> WE WERE STAYING IN A LITTLE  
20110108053435.000|20110108053439.000|CC1|HOUSE THAT WAS OWNED BY THE     
20110108053439.000|20110108053439.000|CC1|CHURCH.                         
20110108053439.000|20110108053442.000|CC1|AND IN A RESIDENTIAL            
20110108053442.000|20110108053443.000|CC1|NEIGHBORHOOD.                   
20110108053443.000|20110108053445.000|CC1|AND A BUNCH OF TRICK-OR-TREATERS
20110108053445.000|20110108053446.000|CC1|CAME OUT, THEY WERE ADULTS AND  
20110108053446.000|20110108053448.000|CC1|SHOWED UP AT THE DOOR WEARING

20110108053455.000|20110108053458.000|CC1|BEHIND THE DOOR AND WAS TELLING 
20110108053458.000|20110108053500.000|CC1|THEM, YOU DON'T WANT TO BE HERE.

20110108053503.000|20110108053504.000|CC1|>> Reporter: OUT OF THE

20110108053510.000|20110108053510.000|CC1|SANK IN.

20110108053511.000|20110108053515.000|CC1|>> THE HARDEST THING WAS THE

20110108054124.000|20110108054127.000|CC1|>> THEY SPENT THREE NIGHTS THERE

20110108054142.000|20110108054142.000|CC1|DOLLARS.

20110108054150.000|20110108054150.000|CC1|ORLEANS.

20110108054256.000|20110108054256.000|CC1|SHOTGUN.                        
20110108054256.000|20110108054257.000|CC1|SHERIFF PAYNE LATER FOUND SOME  
20110108054257.000|20110108054258.000|CC1|SIGNS OF A STRUGGLE BUT         
20110108054258.000|20110108054300.000|CC1|OTHERWISE THE CRIME SCENE WAS A 
20110108054300.000|20110108054302.000|CC1|CARBON COPY OF THE DOUGLASS     
20110108054302.000|20110108054302.000|CC1|MURDERS.                        
20110108054302.000|20110108054307.000|CC1|>> THEY HAD BEEN TIED WITH THE  
20110108054307.000|20110108054308.000|CC1|ROPES, THEIR FEET AND HANDS WERE
20110108054308.000|20110108054309.000|CC1|BOUND BEHIND THEIR BACKS.       
20110108054309.000|20110108054311.000|CC1|THEY HAD HOODS OVER THEIR HEADS 
20110108054311.000|20110108054315.000|CC1|AND BOTH OF THEM HAD BEEN SHOT  
20110108054315.000|20110108054316.000|CC1|EXECUTION STYLE.                
20110108054316.000|20110108054317.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PAYNE DIDN'T KNOW  
20110108054317.000|20110108054318.000|CC1|THEN ABOUT THE DOUGLASS CASE,   
20110108054318.000|20110108054320.000|CC1|DIDN'T CONNECT THE TWO RIGHT    
20110108054320.000|20110108054321.000|CC1|AWAY.

20110108054322.000|20110108054323.000|CC1|ON.                             
20110108054323.000|20110108054331.000|CC1|THE HOMEOWNERS' NEW DATSUN,     
20110108054331.000|20110108054332.000|CC1|280-Z WAS MISSING.              
20110108054332.000|20110108054334.000|CC1|>> WE PUT OUT A BULLETIN FOR    
20110108054334.000|20110108054334.000|CC1|THAT VEHICLE.                   
20110108054334.000|20110108054335.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEY SQUEEZED INTO 
20110108054335.000|20110108054337.000|CC1|THE STOLEN CAR AND HEADED WEST. 
20110108054337.000|20110108054339.000|CC1|THEY HAD A LITTLE CASH, A

20110108054340.000|20110108054345.000|CC1|THE TEXAS MURDERS, AND MARILYN

20110108054345.000|20110108054347.000|CC1|THE TRIO DROVE TO CALIFORNIA

20110108054350.000|20110108054352.000|CC1|WYOMING, AKE AND HATCH LOOKING

20110108054434.000|20110108054435.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AKE AND HATCH

20110108054442.000|20110108054444.000|CC1|>> OUR GUYS GAVE CHASE AND THE

20110108054504.000|20110108054506.000|CC1|>> THEY GOT THE CAR STRUCK IN

20110108054515.000|20110108054518.000|CC1|AND TOOK PONDELLA HOSTAGE.

20110108054520.000|20110108054521.000|CC1|HATCH CONVINCED THE RANCHER THEY

20110108055216.000|20110108055217.000|CC1|HUGE RELIEF, OF COURSE, TO
